tool_description: Detects viral contamination using immunoassay techniques and rapid detection methods suitable for field testing of waterborne viruses.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

detection_method.description: Detection approach: immunoassay, lateral_flow, or concentration_assay

concentration_required.description: Whether sample concentration is needed before testing

error_messages: Invalid detection method: Must be one of [immunoassay, lateral_flow, concentration_assay]
Unsupported virus: One or more target viruses not supported by selected method
Sample volume insufficient: Need larger volume for concentration-based methods
Temperature sensitivity: Viral tests require specific temperature conditions
Reagent degradation: Detection reagents may have degraded due to storage conditions
usage: Provide sample ID, select detection method, and specify target viruses. Indicate if sample concentration is needed. Maintain proper temperature and timing for reagents.

viruses_detected.description: List of viruses detected in sample

viral_load_estimate.description: Estimated viral load level as low, medium, or high

detection_confidence.description: Confidence level of viral detection results
